title: Caroline Shamiso Chitongo
text:
Welcome!EducationHighlighted Projects


I am an aspiring AI/ML Engineer pursuing a BSc in Computer Science at the University of London. I am also interested in Machine Learning research and topics ranging from the empirical theory of deep learning to AI alignment, where I explore ways to enhance alignment schemes and gain deeper insights into ML systems. My interests extend to Natural Language Processing (NLP), Generative AI, and Reinforcement learning. I will be posting each of my projects here as I complete them and also write about non-research stuff. Thanks for stopping by!



Education

 University of London (UoL)Bachelor of Science in Computer Science | 2021 - 2025  Specialization: Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence



Highlighted Projects

Cohere For AI: AYA Project  Title: AYA: An Open Sciene Initiative to Accelerate Multilingual Progress Role: Independent Researcher (Aya Language Ambassador)  Project: Analysis, Dashboard  Verify Credential
Description:The Aya Project, led by Cohere For AI is an open science intiative to support multilingual AI progress. We are creating a multilingual dataset that will be used to train multilingual language models via instruction tuning. The dataset and models will be fully open sourced and released on the 13th of February 2024.

title: Portfolio (Coming Soon end of February)
text:
Thank you for visiting my portfolio section. Currently, it’s in the works, and I’m excited to showcase my projects and achievements by the end February. As I approach the conclusion of my projects, I’ll be adding a collection of my latest work, research, and other noteworthy endeavors.
Feel free to check back for updates then. Your interest is much appreciated, and I look forward to sharing my accomplishments with you.
In the meantime, if you have any inquiries or would like to connect, please don’t hesitate to reach out. Stay tuned for exciting updates end of February!
